text: Yearim Productions Co., Ltd., () founded in 1991, is a full service 2D (including digital animation) Korean animation studio located in Seoul, South Korea with a satellite office in Los Angeles. ==Shows== Show Year(s) Co- production(s) Notes Dragon Tales 1999–2005 Adelaide Productions Duck Dodgers 2003–2005 Warner Bros. Animation American Dad! 2005–present 20th Television Animation Tom and Jerry Tales 2006–2008 Warner Bros. Animation Family Guy 2008–2011 20th Television Animation Phineas and Ferb 2010–2014 Disney Television Animation Seasons 2-4 The Cleveland Show 2010–2013 20th Television Animation The Looney Tunes Show 2011–2014 Warner Bros. Animation Gravity Falls 2014–2015 Disney Television Animation 7 episodes of Season 2. New Looney Tunes 2015-2020 Warner Bros. Animation Bordertown 2016 Bento Box Entertainment Big Mouth 2017 Titmouse, Inc. Bless the Harts 2019-2021 Titmouse, Inc. Central Park 2020-present Bento Box Entertainment Looney Tunes Cartoons 2020-2022 Warner Bros. Animation Kiff 2023-present Disney Television Animation ==Films== Film Year(s) Co-production(s) Notes Garfield: The Movie 2004 20th Century Fox, Davis Entertainment Company, Paws, Inc. Opening title sequence only. Tom and Jerry: Shiver Me Whiskers 2006 Warner Bros. Animation Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale 2007 Warner Bros. Animation Tom and Jerry Meet Sherlock Holmes 2010 Warner Bros. Animation Tom and Jerry and the Wizard of Oz 2011 Warner Bros. Animation Tom and Jerry's Giant Adventure 2013 Warner Bros.
